content: reihen gla cid 425 rechts zweimal nach 2 reihen gla cid 425 rechts dreimal nach einer reihe gla cid 425 rechts danach in jeder reihe abnahmen stricken bis nur noch 8 maschen auf den nadeln sind hier abke cid 425 en und faden gut vernähen i kni cid 425 ed the socks in size 40/41 and with dpn but you can adapt the instruc cid 415 ons to any foot size yarn size and needle type the number of s cid 415 tches should only be an even number i am assuming you are knowledgeable of socks kni cid 427 ng basics cast on 16 or another number s cid 415 tches per needle with 4-ply yarn and join in the round first knit two row stockine cid 425 e s cid 415 tch then work the cuff over 23 row with 2 knit / 2 purl from row 24 alternate between one row in stockine cid 425 e and one row in 2 knit / 2 purl - this is the basic pa cid 425 ern from row 56 switch to back of foot stockine cid 425 e s cid 415 tch and con cid 415 nue the basic pa cid 425 ern over the front foot i worked an increase heel a cid 332 er row 60 where i worked a yarn over at the end of needle 1 in every odd row and also at the beginning of needle 4 i then kni cid 425 ed these s cid 415 tches in the even row work the yarn over at the end of the 1st needle from the front to the back and knit through back loop in the following row work the yarn over at the beginning of the 4th needle from the back to the front and knit in the following row as soon as the correct number of addi cid 415 onal s cid 415 tches have been picked up this corresponds to the number of s cid 415 tches originally picked up per needle minus 1 decrease the new s cid 415 tches again to do this knit one s cid 415 tch in the next row slip one s cid 415 tch knit one s cid 415 tch and slip the slipped s cid 415 tch over it knit another s cid 415 tch and turn the work to wrong side now purl 4 s cid 415 tches purl 2 s cid 415 tches together and purl another s cid 415 tch - turn the work to right side again in the next row slip the last s cid 415 tch of the previous row knit the next s cid 415 tch slip the slipped s cid 415 tch over and knit another s cid 415 tch turn the work con cid 415 nue in this way un cid 415 l all the increased s cid 415 tches have been kni cid 425 ed off then work in the round again and
